entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in New Zealand
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information about the COVID-19 situation from the government, health authorities and other trusted sources across New Zealand. For more, visit https://covid19.govt.nz/.

text: @KFaulders @Santucci I feel SO much better our needle-di#% bug-f#%@er Prez is consulting J-Rod (or whatever the f#%@ we call them) on the COVID-19 "cold, flu or whatever".  Nothing like their "expertise" to straighten this whole mess out.
